plot: Nadine takes her son, Baptiste, to the sea. During a weekend, they will try to talk together.
title: Ciao bambino
plot_es: Nadine takes her son, Baptiste, to the sea. During a weekend, they will try to talk together.
plot_en: Nadine takes her son, Baptiste, to the sea. During a weekend, they will try to talk together.
